title: Constr Mgt & Megaprojects
description: Covers planning and development of megaprojects. Addresses social, environmental, and economic impacts of megaprojects. Discusses cultural differences & ethical issues in managing megaprojects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
